title: Creativity study - measures of central tendency

content.question:
Time
 Frequency (Number of participants)

0 seconds - 1 minute
 3

1.1 minutes - 2 minutes
 12

2.1 minutes - 3 minutes
 10

3.1 minutes - 4 minutes
 8

4.1 minutes - 5 minutes
 6

5.1 minutes - 6 minutes
 2

6.1 minutes - 7 minutes
 1

7.1 minutes - 8 minutes
 1

Dr. Ronaldo wants to measure levels of creativity in the participants in his study. He presents an ambiguous object and records how long it takes for the participants to come up with at least six practical uses for each of the objects. The data in the graph represent the time and the number of participants who completed the six responses within that time range. Which of the following best represents the measures of central tendency in this data set?

choices.label: The mean will be higher than the mode
The mean, mode and median are all the same
The results will be statistically significant
The median will be higher than the mean

content.answer: The mean will be higher than the mode

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
